titleStmt.title: A nevv dispensatory of fourty physicall receipts. Most necessary and profitable for all house-keepers in their families. Besides three other pleasant arts fit for young gentlemen. / Published by Salvatore Winter of Naples, an expert operator.
titleStmt.author: Winter, Salvator.

notesStmt.note: Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1771 as Wing (2nd ed.) W3086.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts), and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (Early English books).
